title: Cuisinart for Illy® Buona Tazza® Single Serve Espresso and Coffee Machine (EM-400) Infomercial Video
description:
The Cuisinart® Buona Tazza® Single Serve Espresso and Coffee Machine makes extraordinary espresso and freshly brewed coffee at the touch of a button. Created exclusively for the illy® iperEspresso capsule system, the unit offers dual temperatures and adjustable coffee flavor strength. The versatile machine accommodates three cup sizes: Flip-up tray and removable drip tray let you brew directly into demitasse, regular, or tall travel mugs. Designed to brew perfect espresso and traditional coffee – every day! 

See more: http://www.cuisinart.com/products/espresso_makers/em-400.html
